description:
Secure yourself, equalize a belay, or extend an anchor with a loop of dynamic rope. A dynamic sling offers higher protection than similar sewn slings as it can absorb impact forces better in the case of an accidental slip or dynamic loading. The rope sheath protects the load-bearing core from UV light and abrasion.

  • Made of 8.3mm dynamic rope loop
  • Thermo-moulded cover protects connection point
  • Meets EN566 and EN354 standards
name: Beal Dynaloop Sling
